Key Match Events: Nikola Vucevic and LaVine each made a 3 to get Chicago within one with 2:38 to go
White made a go-ahead layup with 47 seconds left
White then drove into the lane and dunked over a late-arriving Wembanyama
Paul made two foul shots, a pullup jumper and a 3-pointer to extend the Spurs' advantage to 86-73
Post-Match Reflections: Spurs: With his length and athleticism, Wembanyama led the way on the defensive side. But he got some help, too. Vassell blocked three shots and grabbed two steals.
Bulls: Won for the fourth time in five games. They also rallied for a wild 139-126 victory over the New York Knicks on Saturday night.
